definition: circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)

pinyin: yuan2 zhu1 xing2 li2 zi3 jiao1 huan4 ji4

sentences.english: No mystery about what it's like to be a ball point pen.
sentences.chinese: 变成圆珠笔本身并没有什么神秘的。

sentences.english: As long as he doesn't study hard, ShenJiaYi will use a ball-point pen poked his clothes.
sentences.chinese: 只要他不认真学习，沈佳宜就会用圆珠笔戳他的衣服。

sentences.english: I rummaged all the drawers before I found my ballpoint pen.
sentences.chinese: 我翻遍了所有的抽屉才找到我的圆珠笔。

sentences.english: Tactical Pen ESP is a perfect combination of a ballpoint pen and Kubotan.
sentences.chinese: ESP战术防卫笔是圆珠笔和酷棍的结合体。

sentences.english: Why can we write so smoothly with ball pens?
sentences.chinese: 为什么我们能用圆珠笔写字写得这么平滑？

sentences.english: This type of ball pen is used as a knife for cutting paper by teenagers.
sentences.chinese: 这款圆珠笔被青少年当作小刀用来裁纸。

sentences.english: Mary has a new ballpoint pen.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽有一支新的圆珠笔。

sentences.english: Why not?need some stationery. I run out of some paper and ball pens.
sentences.chinese: 我想买一些文具用品，我的纸盒圆珠笔都没了。
我们喜欢用圆珠笔写书。

sentences.english: I'd like to see your new ball-pen.
sentences.chinese: 我想看一看你的新圆珠笔。

sentences.english: The boys were bickering over some ballpoints.
sentences.chinese: 那些男孩子为几支圆珠笔争吵起来了。

sentences.english: Why doesn't he use a ballpoint, or at least a fountain pen?
sentences.chinese: 他为什么不用圆珠笔，至少是自来水笔？

sentences.english: These large hole round beads are a gorgeous lilac pink color with thin purple stripes.
sentences.chinese: 这些大洞是一个美丽的圆珠丁香粉红色薄紫色条纹。

sentences.english: Party A orders 10,000 red ball-pens from Party B.
sentences.chinese: “甲方向乙方订购一万支红笔芯的圆珠笔”。

sentences.english: Please write with a ballpoint or fountain pen.

definition: Karakax County in Hotan Prefecture 和田地區|和田地区[He2 tian2 Di4 qu1], Xinjiang
